      • queryUsers

        public static UserPageInfo queryUsers(java.lang.String attributeName,
                      java.lang.String opName,
                      java.lang.String searchString)
                               throws SampleAppException
        This method returns the results of a query for users.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - The attribute on which the queries are made of.
        opName - The operator name that would be applied to the attribute.
        searchString - The string that would be searched for this attribute.
        Returns:
        A page of users satisfying this query criteria.
        Throws:
        SampleAppException - If the operation can not be carried out successfully.
